segments.text: What can I do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need to return a book .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I do anything else for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to check this magazine out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We don ’ t allow people to check out magazines .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s just a policy of ours .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So what am I allowed to check out ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You may check out books or videos .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need to check out this magazine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You will have to just read it in the library .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That doesn ’ t make any sense .
segments.speaker: S2
